BEGIN 
    EXECUTE IMMEDIATE 'CREATE TABLE 
    "{TableName}" (
        "LogNo" NUMBER(0,0) GENERATED BY DEFAULT ON NULL AS IDENTITY NOT NULL,
        "Acknowledge" NVARCHAR2(1),
        "ApplicationID" NVARCHAR2(36),
        "CreatedAt" TIMESTAMP,
        "Flow" NVARCHAR2(1),
        "Format" NVARCHAR2(1),
        "GlobalID" NVARCHAR2(50),
        "Level" NVARCHAR2(1),
        "Message" NCLOB,
        "ProgramName" NVARCHAR2(50),
        "ProjectID" NVARCHAR2(36),
        "Properties" NCLOB,
        "RunningEnvironment" NVARCHAR2(1),
        "ServerID" NVARCHAR2(30),
        "ServiceID" NVARCHAR2(36),
        "TransactionID" NVARCHAR2(36),
        "Type" NVARCHAR2(1),
        "UserID" NVARCHAR2(36),
        CONSTRAINT "PK_{TableName}" PRIMARY KEY ("LogNo")
    )';

    EXECUTE IMMEDIATE 'COMMENT ON COLUMN "{TableName}"."LogNo" IS ''로그순번''';
    EXECUTE IMMEDIATE 'COMMENT ON COLUMN "{TableName}"."Acknowledge" IS ''거래구분''';
    EXECUTE IMMEDIATE 'COMMENT ON COLUMN "{TableName}"."ApplicationID" IS ''어플리케이션ID''';
    EXECUTE IMMEDIATE 'COMMENT ON COLUMN "{TableName}"."CreatedAt" IS ''입력일시''';
    EXECUTE IMMEDIATE 'COMMENT ON COLUMN "{TableName}"."Flow" IS ''업무흐름''';
    EXECUTE IMMEDIATE 'COMMENT ON COLUMN "{TableName}"."Format" IS ''데이터포맷''';
    EXECUTE IMMEDIATE 'COMMENT ON COLUMN "{TableName}"."GlobalID" IS ''거래고유ID''';
    EXECUTE IMMEDIATE 'COMMENT ON COLUMN "{TableName}"."Level" IS ''업무수준''';
    EXECUTE IMMEDIATE 'COMMENT ON COLUMN "{TableName}"."Message" IS ''로그메시지''';
    EXECUTE IMMEDIATE 'COMMENT ON COLUMN "{TableName}"."ProgramName" IS ''프로그램''';
    EXECUTE IMMEDIATE 'COMMENT ON COLUMN "{TableName}"."ProjectID" IS ''프로젝트ID''';
    EXECUTE IMMEDIATE 'COMMENT ON COLUMN "{TableName}"."Properties" IS ''추가속성''';
    EXECUTE IMMEDIATE 'COMMENT ON COLUMN "{TableName}"."RunningEnvironment" IS ''실행환경''';
    EXECUTE IMMEDIATE 'COMMENT ON COLUMN "{TableName}"."ServerID" IS ''서버ID''';
    EXECUTE IMMEDIATE 'COMMENT ON COLUMN "{TableName}"."ServiceID" IS ''서비스ID''';
    EXECUTE IMMEDIATE 'COMMENT ON COLUMN "{TableName}"."TransactionID" IS ''거래ID''';
    EXECUTE IMMEDIATE 'COMMENT ON COLUMN "{TableName}"."Type" IS ''업무구분''';
    EXECUTE IMMEDIATE 'COMMENT ON COLUMN "{TableName}"."UserID" IS ''입력자ID''';

    EXECUTE IMMEDIATE 'CREATE INDEX IX_{TableName}_GlobalID
    ON "{TableName}" ("GlobalID")';

    EXECUTE IMMEDIATE 'CREATE INDEX IX_{TableName}_CreatedAt
    ON "{TableName}" ("CreatedAt" DESC)';
END;/
